```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(htmltools)

opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE)

# Convenience functions
top_level_image <- function(img_name, img_title) {
    as.character(img(
        src = paste0('img/', img_name),
        title = img_title,
        width = '640px'
    ))
}

dl <- tags$dl
dt <- function(...) {
    dotlist <- list(...)
    dotlist$class <- paste(dotlist$class, 'text-primary')
    do.call(tags$dt, dotlist)
}
dd <- tags$dd
ul <- tags$ul
li <- tags$li
```

`r top_level_image('bookring.jpg', 'As from a fairytale')`
